fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.types

Interface ITextData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IData<ITextType>, ITranslated

    public interface ITextData
extends IData<ITextType>, ITranslated
    Provides typed access to text data for a cell, such as simple strings or text-based documents.

    The data value is of type String. The value may be set using any instance of CharSequence or by using the writer.

    For localized text data instances, values can be accessed using methods of the ITranslated interface. In such cases, note that the global text value may be an arbitrarily-selected localized text value, and that the normal value may concatenate all localized values in an arbitrary format.

    Thread-safety: implementations of this interface are not required to be safe for concurrent access. Therefore, processing should generally not be shared between multiple threads.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        String getValue()
        Gets the data value as a string. Note that it may be more efficient to access data with a reader.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface IData<ITextType>
        Returns:
        the value as a string, or null if there is no data.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getValueReader(), ITextType.isLargeObject()

      • setLocalText

        void setLocalText(Locale locale,
                  String text)
           throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Sets (or removes) a localized text value, for localized text types.
        Parameters:
        locale - the non-null locale.
        text - the text, or null to remove any current text associated with the specified locale. An empty string is not considered equivalent to null, however it may be coerced to null when persisted (depending on the vendor of the underlying data storage platform).
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - for non-localized text types.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ITranslated.getLocalText(java.util.Locale), ITranslated.getTextLocales(), ILocaleService.getText(java.util.Locale, fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.locale.ITranslated)

      • getValueReader

        Reader getValueReader()
               throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Gets a reader for accessing a data value efficiently.

        For localized text data instances, this method is not normally supported and an exception may be thrown if used.

        Returns:
        the reader, or null if there is no data.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - for localized text types.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ITextType.isLargeObject()

      • getValueWriter

        Writer getValueWriter()
               throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Gets an writer for updating a data value efficiently.

        For localized text data instances, this method is not normally supported and an exception may be thrown if used.

        Note: the value is applied when the writer is closed.

        Returns:
        the writer.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - for localized text types.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ITextType.isLargeObject()
